After the user confirms his email he is redirected to a page where he can add more details - phone, address, etc. only after the user completes his details, a request is sent to the auction house admin to approve the user. The details will be saved in bidspirit system through the usersupdateDetails api

Resend the confirmation mail - through the usersresendConfirmationMail api Change his email (e.g. in case the user had a type in his email) - through the usersupdateEmail api. A new confirmation mail will be sent to the user.

Bidspirit system send a confirmation email to the user. Until the user confirms his email he cannot proceed with the registration, and the auction house admin will not get notified on the new registration. At this point the user can do 2 things:

User fills basic details (name, email and password) . this is achieved with the usersregister api If the user tries to register with an existing user in the auction house environment an error response code USER_EXIST
Did not confirmed his email yet

Downloading backup archives through the browser is disabled by default because it's likely that another plugin or PHP may add unexpected date at the beginning or the end of the backup archive. This would corrupt (break) the backup archives you download through the browser, making them impossible to restore.
